tier.item: the young one spoke to me

igt.tag-types: M+AC+LN B B B B L G T

tier.item: (89) a. Nkore-Kiga (a Bantu language of Uganda, Taylor 1985:99)
`I went with Mugasho; Mugasho and I went.'
(89) a. Nkore-Kiga (a Bantu language of Uganda, Taylor 1985:99)
`I went with Mugasho; Mugasho and I went.'
(89) a. Nkore-Kiga (a Bantu language of Uganda, Taylor 1985:99)
I went with Mugasho; Mugasho and I went.
The potatoes are in the pot.
`I put the potatoes into the pot.'
`I put the potatoes into the pot.'
I put the potatoes into the pot.
`I took the potatoes out of the pot.' (Taylor 1985: 109-110)
`I took the potatoes out of the pot.' (Taylor 1985: 109-110)
I took the potatoes out of the pot.
